Function processes macro 'rating'.

Definition at line 96 of file rating_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Limitations = array( 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'rating' , $Limitations ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
                              
                              $MasterId = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_id' );
                              $MasterType = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_type' , 'user' );

                              $Rating = $this->RatingAlgorithms->get_rating( $MasterId , $MasterType );
                              
                              $ShowPrefix = intval( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'show_prefix' , 0 ) );
                              $Rating = $ShowPrefix == 1 ? "{lang:rating}: $Rating" : $Rating;
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{rating:$Params}" , $Rating , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
